smartBuilding.sectionTop.title: SMART BUILDING
smartBuilding.sectionTop.subTitle: We are proud to bring customers with a barrier; apply solid, modern, and safe digital technologies for residential areas, projects and buildings.
smartBuilding.sectionSystem.title: System in Smart Building solutions
smartBuilding.sectionSystem.subTitle: SMART BUILDING
smartBuilding.sectionSystem.smartDoorLoc: SMART DOOR LOCK & VIDEO DOOR PHONE
smartBuilding.sectionSmartDoorLocks.subT: SMART DOOR LOCK & VIDEO DOOR PHONE

utilList.title: Integrate modern unlocking features
utilList.subTitle: Access options include an NFC card, code, fingerprint, key, video door phone, remote control, etc.

utilList.title: Absolute safety protection
utilList.subTitle: Absolute safety protection for the apartment: audible alarm when subjected to strong external force; lock down automatically when entering the wrong passcode consecutively; etc.

utilList.title: Control detailed entry/exit schedules
utilList.subTitle: Enhanced connectivity allows remote door opening and locking. Automatically send in and out history messages. A superior solution for innkeepers and homestays to manage and protect properties.

smartBuilding.sectionTechnologyDoorLocks: Unicloud is currently collaborating with Dahua, a Smart door lock manufacturer.
smartBuilding.sectionSmartElevator.title: Smart elevator system

utilList.title: Save time
utilList.subTitle: Reasonably compute the shortest time for the elevator to move around floors.

utilList.title: Control the right to move with magnetic cards
utilList.subTitle: Unique ID cards are authorized to specific floors. Help keep security under absolute control in case of strangers entering the building.

utilList.title: Control by face recognition
utilList.subTitle: Facial recognition to call the elevator, open the barrier of the parking area, optionally apartment owners either using a video calling bell or through the application for residents to call the elevator to the correct apartment.

technologyList.title: Application to call elevator on smartphone

Unicloud is currently a partner with the Mitsubishi Elevator brand.

utilList.title: Integration of eKYC identity technology
utilList.subTitle: The face recognition device 4.0 eKYC at the turnstile helps identify, distinguish and track people entering and leaving the area.

utilList.title: Automatic smart lock
utilList.subTitle: Auto-lock and anti-following features will be activated after a few seconds when a person passes and only one person passes once.

utilList.title: Increased security
utilList.subTitle: The camera system can work offline to ensure security even during a power outage and send alerts when abnormal intrusions are detected.

technologyList.title: Scan card to open the door
The software sends an alert to the host server

smartBuilding.sectionTechnologyTurnstile: Unicloud's software and hardware system can be integrated with any turnstile product with Trigger
smartBuilding.sectionSmartFaceID.title: Face ID time attendance system

utilList.title: Fast & Accurate Identification
utilList.subTitle: Can authenticate from a long distance without touching the device with fast and accurate facial recognition speed.

utilList.title: High security
utilList.subTitle: Modern time attendance solution with high security, avoiding information leakage and supporting safe data management and processing.

utilList.title: Easy to integrate
utilList.subTitle: FaceID can integrate with intelligent device systems at doors, elevators, apartment buildings, and buildings to enhance security and convenient attendance.

smartBuilding.sectionTechnologyFaceID.co: Unicloud is existing provides the entire Face ID system for customers with projects located in commercial centres, buildings, apartments, offices, etc.
